meanings.definition: A person who holds a lease on property.
meanings.sent1: The leaseholders pay rent to live in the apartment.
meanings.sent2: The leaseholders signed a contract for the office space.
meanings.sent3: The leaseholders threw a party to celebrate their new lease.
meanings.sent4: The leaseholders are like temporary owners of the property.
meanings.sent5: The leaseholders take care of the rented property as if it were their own.

meanings.definition: Those who have a lease on a property.
meanings.sent1: The leaseholders are responsible for maintaining the house.
meanings.sent2: The leaseholders have agreed to pay a monthly fee for the shop.
meanings.sent3: The leaseholders organized a community event in the rented space.
meanings.sent4: The leaseholders hold the keys to the rented property.
meanings.sent5: The leaseholders enjoy the benefits of the leased property.
